Weapon.DESCRIPTION: When using a Weapon card with the name attached, will get the attribute provided by the card.The upper limit of Weapons`s layer is 3, and the maximum number of equipment is 1.

Sublimation.DESCRIPTION: When using a Weapon card with a new name, if you already have a Weapon, increase the corresponding number of layers; otherwise, replace the attribute provided by the weapon before removing it.

Dancing.DESCRIPTION: According to the type of Weapon, the attack effect is added. NL Sword:Apply 1 Weak after using AttackCard. NL Crossbow:Apply 2 poison after using AttackCard NL Shield:Gain 2 Block after using AttackCard NL Spear:Apply 1 Vulnerable after using AttackCard

GanJiangMoYe.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Strength per GanJiangMoYe .The first target you use each round is the enemy's attack card will be repeated N times.(N=Number of layers of GanJiangMoYe)

BloodthirstySword.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Strength per BloodthirstySword .After using attack card，Restores the damage N/6 times the health.(N=Number of layers of BloodthirstySword)

Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Strength per Excalibur .Start every turn, gain N TheContractOfVictory.(N=Number of layers of Excalibur)

Hrunting.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 more Strength per Hrunting .Apply N Weak after using attack card.(N=Number of layers of Hrunting)

ExplosiveArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Dexterity per ExplosiveArmor .Gain 3 more Thorns per ExplosiveArmor.

RhoAias.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Dexterity per RhoAias .Gain Barricade. Each RhoAias reduce 3 damage

GaeBolg.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Strength per GaeBolg .Each GaeBolg apply 2 ImprintOfDeath after using attack card.

GaeBolgBolg.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 more Strength per GaeBolgBolg .Gain 1 per Metalization per GaeBolgBolg.

TheContractOfVictory.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the battle.Each TheContractOfVictory adds 1 health response and maximum health.But the max of TheContractOfVictory is 10.

PLASMA.DESCRIPTION: The number of Weapon` layer add 1.If the first Weapon` layer reach the upper limit, make the second  Weapon` layer add 1....

Incomplete.DESCRIPTION: When you upgrade the card, you won't get any results.

WeaponMaster.DESCRIPTION: Equip the upper limit of Weapon +1.

Chaos.DESCRIPTION: Temporarily make the upper limit of equipment Weapon +1，disappeared after being equipped with Weapon.Can only have 1 layer of Chaos at the same time. Lose this ability at the end of the round.

LuEnRune-Attack.DESCRIPTION: Damage all enemy that causes M times the sum of all current Weapon layers. Exhaust . Dancing .

LuEnRune-Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain the block of M times the sum of all current Weapon layers.Exhaust  .

ImprintOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: The next attack deals 1 more damage per ImprintOfDeath.One of ImprintOfDeath is removed at end of turn.When the turn starts, if the ImprintOfDeath`s layer is greater than 10, give 50 fixed damage. Then remove all the ImprintOfDeath.
